schemes.description: A comprehensive crop insurance scheme to protect farmers from crop losses due to natural calamities
benefits: Insurance coverage and financial support to farmers in case of crop failure
Stabilizing farmer income to ensure continuity in farming
Encouraging farmers to adopt innovative practices
eligibility: All farmers including sharecroppers and tenant farmers
Growing notified crops in notified areas
Required to have insurable interest in the crop

schemes.description: State-specific assistance for drought-affected farmers in Maharashtra
benefits: Input subsidy for next crop season
eligibility: Farmers in drought-declared districts of Maharashtra
Crop loss above 33% in declared drought area

schemes.description: Direct income support to farmer families to supplement their financial needs
benefits: Rs. 6000 per year in three installments

schemes.description: Emergency assistance for farmers affected by severe natural calamities
benefits: Support for restoration of damaged agricultural infrastructure
eligibility: Farmers in officially declared disaster-affected areas
Verifiable crop loss due to natural calamity

schemes.description: State-specific scheme for debt relief to marginal farmers
benefits: Waiver of agricultural loans up to specified amount
eligibility: Small and marginal farmers in Punjab

schemes.description: Provides farmers with timely access to credit
eligibility: All farmers, tenant farmers, and sharecroppers
